Body.Content:
In mid-October 2025, the export of the Device status report for Platform scripts (Devices > Scripts and remediations > Platform scripts > select a script > Device status) from the Intune admin center will change to match the Intune Export API format. Field names in the exported report will align with the properties documented in Intune reports and properties available using Graph API.

How this will affect your organization:

If you rely on the export of the Device status report for Platform scripts from the Intune admin center, you will see the following updated field names:

  • Device name > DeviceName
  • User name > UserName
  • OS Version > OSVersion
  • Status > RunState
  • Last Updated > ModifiedTime
  • Result > PolicyResultDetail (macOS only)

Note: This change does not affect any automation or reporting that already uses the Intune Export API.

What you need to do to prepare:

Update your documentation and reporting as needed. Otherwise, no action is required, only awareness.
